name: atlas-agents
description: Agent team plugins for Claude Code - pre-configured teams of specialized agents that collaborate on complex tasks

plugins.name: fullstack-dev
plugins.description: Full-stack development team with frontend, backend, QA, and DevOps agents that collaborate through phased workflows

plugins.name: game-dev
plugins.description: Multi-engine game development team with Unity, Unreal, Godot, Three.js/R3F, and Orleans agents that collaborate through phased workflows

plugins.name: marketing-seo
plugins.description: Marketing, SEO, and social media team for content creation, optimization, and engagement

plugins.name: data-science
plugins.description: Data science and machine learning team for data analysis, ML model development, and MLOps

plugins.name: devops-cloud
plugins.description: DevOps and cloud team for infrastructure, CI/CD, deployment, and observability

plugins.name: design-ux
plugins.description: Design and UX team for user research, UI/UX design, wireframing, and accessibility

plugins.name: security
plugins.description: Security team for code security, vulnerability scanning, threat analysis, and compliance

plugins.name: documentation
plugins.description: Documentation team for technical writing, API documentation, tutorials, and guides

plugins.name: qa-testing
plugins.description: QA and testing team for automated testing, test coverage, performance testing, and quality assurance

plugins.name: mobile-dev
plugins.description: Mobile development team for iOS, Android, and cross-platform applications

plugins.name: 3d-design
